message: I propose dividing the $100 with an 80/20 split in favor of Alice. This allows us to start with a fair distribution while accounting for the decreasing value of money over time.
I propose a 90/10 split in my favor, as I believe I deserve the majority of the reward for taking on the risk of rejection in future rounds.
Considering the decrease in the value of money, I propose a 72/28 split. This maintains a fair distribution while adjusting for inflation. I hope this aligns with your expectations.
Given the decreasing value of money, I'm willing to compromise, but I believe 85/15 is a more reasonable split, considering the risks I'm taking by pushing for a higher share.
